name: The Forest We Deserve
description:
Upon clicking run, the game will open in this same window, full screen. Click back in your browser to exit. 

The Forest We Deserve is a short, explorative, twine game in which you play a tired university student wandering aimlessly into the woods by their dorm. Discover the secrets of the forest while examining your deepest insecurities.

Content Warning: This game contains sequences of mild horror, mentions of drugs, and external links to content that contains abuse, murder, and disease.

Made for Tad Leckman's CMPM 80K (Intro to Game Design) class at UCSC, Spring Quarter 2020.
